title: Dynamite (abridged)
lyrics:
[intro]
'Cause (Bm)ah ah, (Em)I'm in the (A)stars tonight (D)
So watch me (Bm)bring the (Em)fire and set the (A)night alight (D)
 
(Bm) Shoes on, (Em)get up in the morn'
Cup of (A)milk, let's rock and (D)roll
(Bm) King kong, (Em)kick the drum
Rolling (A)on like a rolling (D)stone
(Bm) Sing song when I'm (Em)walking home
Jump (A)up to the top, le(D)Bron
(Bm) Ding dong, call me (Em)on my phone
Ice (A)tea and a game of ping (D)pong
 
[drums in]
(Bm)This is, getting, (Em)heavy
Can you hear the (A)bass boom? I'm (D)ready
(Bm)Life is, sweet as, (Em)honey
Yeah, this (A)beat cha-ching like (D)money
(Bm)Disco (Em)overload, I'm (A)into that, I'm (D)good to go
I'm (Bm)diamond, you (Em)know I glow up
(A) Hey, so let's (D)go
 
[chorus]
'Cause (Bm)ah ah, (Em)I'm in the (A)stars tonight (D)
So watch me (Bm)bring the (Em)fire and set the (A)night alight (D) (hey)
(Bm)Shining through the (Em)city with a (A)little funk and (D)soul
So lemme (Bm)light it (Em)up like (A)dynamite, woh-(D)oh-oh
 
(Bm) Bring a friend, (Em)join the crowd, who(A)ever wanna come a-(D)long
(Bm) Word up, (Em)talk the talk, just (A)move like we off the (D)wall
(Bm) Day or night, the (Em)sky's alight, so we (A)dance to the break of (D)dawn
[spoken] (Bm)Ladies and gentlemen
(Em)I got the medicine so (A)you should keep ya eyes on the (D)ball, huh
 
(Bm)This is, getting, (Em)heavy
Can you hear the (A)bass boom? I'm (D)ready (wooh-ooh)
(Bm)Life is, sweet as, (Em)honey
Yeah, this (A)beat cha-ching like (D)money
(Bm)Disco (Em)overload, I'm (A)into that, I'm (D)good to go
I'm (Bm)diamond, you (Em)know I glow up
(A) â€¦  Let's (D)go
 
[chorus]
'Cause (Bm)ah ah, (Em)I'm in the (A)stars tonight (D)
So watch me (Bm)bring the (Em)fire and set the (A)night alight (D) (hey)
(Bm)Shining through the (Em)city with a (A)little funk and (D)soul
So lemme (Bm)light it (Em)up like (A)dynamite, woh-(D)oh-oh
 
[post-chorus]
(Bm)Dyna-na-na-na-na, na (Em)na, na-na, na, na-na (A)na, life is (D)dynamite
(Bm)Dyna-na-na-na-na, na (Em)na, na-na, na, na-na (A)na, life is (D)dynamite
(Bm)Shining through the (Em)city with a (A)little funk and (D)soul
So lemme (Bm)light it (Em)up like (A)dynamite, woh-(D)oh-oh
 
[bridge]
(Bm)Dyn, na-na-na, na-na, (Em) na-na, ayy
(A)Dyn, na-na-na, na-na, (D) na-na, ayy
(Bm)Dyn, na-na-na, na-na, (Em) na-na, ayy
(A)Light it up like dy(D)namite
(Bm)Dyn, na-na-na, na-na, (Em) na-na, ayy
(A)Dyn, na-na-na, na-na, (D) na-na, ayy
(Bm)Dyn, na-na-na, na-na, (Em) na-na, ayy
(A)Light it up like dy(D)namite
 
[chorus]
'Cause (Bm)ah ah, (Em)I'm in the (A)stars tonight (D)
So watch me (Bm)bring the (Em)fire and set the (A)night alight (D) (hey)
(Bm)Shining through the (Em)city with a (A)little funk and (D)soul
So lemme (Bm)light it (Em)up like (A)dynamite, woh-(D)oh-oh
[single strums]
So lemme (Bm)light it (Em)up like (A-A)dynamite (D) [end]
